metadata.title: CVE-2022-22756 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: If a user was convinced to drag and drop an image to their desktop or otherfolder, the resulting object could have been changed into an executablescript which would have run arbitrary code after the user clicked on it.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 97, Thunderbird < 91.6, and FirefoxESR < 91.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
